original_text:
The wicked foe pulls all of them up with hooks,
    he catches them in his net,
he gathers them up in his dragnet;
    and so he rejoices and is glad.
korean_text: 그가 낚시로 모두 낚으며 그물로 잡으며 투망으로 모으고 그리고는 기뻐하고 즐거워하여

sentences.original_text: The wicked foe pulls all of them up with hooks
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 적이 갈고리로 그들을 모두 끌어올립니다

sentences.original_text: he catches them in his net
he gathers them up in his dragnet
and so he rejoices and is glad
